events.message: I recently purchased a product but I want to request a refund because the item does not meet my expectations.
The customer reported a refund request due to dissatisfaction with the purchased product.
Assigning refund case to refund specialist team for further assistance.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I am here to assist you with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason you would like to request a refund?
My order number is 12345678. The product arrived but it is not what I expected and I want my money back.
We can initiate a full refund upon return of the product. I will send you the return instructions and prepaid shipping label.
Thank you, that solution works for me. Please send the return label as soon as possible.
The return label has been sent to your email. Once we receive the returned product, your refund will be processed promptly.
Just following up to ensure you received the refund after returning the product and to check if you need further assistance.
Since your refund has been completed and no further issues were reported, we are closing this support case. Have a great day!
We have sent a satisfaction survey to your email. Please take a moment to share your feedback about our support.
The customer completed the satisfaction survey and rated the support experience as very satisfactory.
The refund case has been archived in the system as all actions are complete and the issue is resolved.
